content: Hello, new here. Is there any interest in an Index trait that returns values? I've been wanting this for some FFI code recently. Was told that here was the best place to ask about substantial feature requests.
I believe there's an existing RFC for that

Looking at the RFC, it appears that there was a lot of discussion but no conclusive answer and no progress in the past 1-2 months. I think this is possibly due to the fact that while it is nice to have these traits, it introduces unexpected complexity, while basically converting a method call from value.fn(idx) to value[idx]. If you have a really compelling use case it might be worthwhile to bring it up in the comments there
